name: Blood And Mead
detailed_description:
A scoundrel Viking, banished for his godlike thirst becomes an unlikely hero as embarks on an epic adventure to solve the mystery of a mead drought threatening his Norse homeland.

Join Olaf the Drunk on a quest that sets him off to explore the beautiful realm of Midgard and the uncharted lands beyond the Great Sea; the far off ancient wonders of feudal Asia, the Silk Road and Pharaoh’s Egypt!





  • A 2D Adventure Platformer with a compelling design philosophy.
  • Explore a vast atmospheric landscape, from the mythological Viking homeland of Midgard to the Silk Road and Pharaoh's Egypt.
  • Craft forbidden mead recipes that bestow the drinker with the powers of the Norse gods.
  • Tight combat utilizing multiple weapons, shields and mead... lots and lots of mead.
  • Go head-to-head with Vikings, monsters, demons and the gods themselves (epic boss battles).
  • Ride a pig naked though a burning village.
  • Upgrade armour and weapons to become a true Viking beserker.
  • Sail to the mysterious exotic lands beyond the Great Sea.
  • Enjoy a captivating story filled with humour.
  • A delightful sound track filled with medieval flair.

"Better to fight and fall than to live without mead." - Ragnar the Bold, 100AD.

reviews:
“Tough platforming action, irreverent humour - a mighty contribution to the adventure platforming genre”
Oliver Joyce, creator of Swords and Sandals

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
